settings.description: The top-level object containing configuration properties for built-in rules.

usingDirectivesPlacement.description:
Specifies the desired placement of using directives.
insideNamespace: Place using directives inside the namespace definition
outsideNamespace: Place using directives outside the namespace definition
preserve: Allow using directives inside or outside the namespace definition

allowCommonHungarianPrefixes.description: Determines whether common Hungarian notation prefixes should be allowed.

documentExposedElements.description: Specifies whether exposed elements need to be documented. When true, all publicly-exposed types and members require documentation.

documentInternalElements.description: Specifies whether internal elements need to be documented. When true, all internally-exposed types and members require documentation.

documentPrivateElements.description: Specifies whether private elements need to be documented. When true, all types and members except for declared private fields require documentation.

documentInterfaces.description: Specifies whether interface members need to be documented. When true, all interface members require documentation, regardless of accessibility.

documentPrivateFields.description: Specifies whether private fields need to be documented. When true, all fields require documentation, regardless of accessibility.

companyName.description: The name of the company which appears in file headers.

copyrightText.description: The copyright text which should appear in file headers.

variables.description: Replacement variables which may be used in the 'copyrightText' value.

xmlHeader.description: Determines whether the file header should be wrapped in the StyleCop-standard XML structure.

fileNamingConvention.description: Specifies the preferred naming convention for files. The default value "stylecop" uses the naming convention defined by StyleCop Classic, while "metadata" uses a file naming convention that matches the metadata names of types.
